item.title: Can AI Answer Assist perform multilingual translation?
item.description:
Multilingual Translation Features link

Using the custom instruction feature of AI Answer Assist (AI Answer Improver), translation between Japanese and multiple languages is possible.

How to Use Translation link

Basic Translation link

By simply entering “translate to English” in the custom instructions, you can instantly translate Japanese responses into English.

Examples of supported languages:

  • English
  • Chinese (Simplified and Traditional)
  • Korean
  • Spanish
  • French
  • German
  • Many others

Translation + Style Adjustment link

Style adjustment is possible simultaneously with translation.

item.title: How to Create Refined Answers from Multiple Documents
item.description:
Information Integration from Multiple Documents link

In customer support, it’s common to collect information from multiple manuals, FAQs, and technical documents to create responses. AI Answer Assist (AI Answer Improver) enables you to perform this task efficiently.

Challenge: Scattered Information link

When copying and pasting information from multiple documents, the following issues tend to occur:

  • Inconsistent writing style and tone
  • Uneven levels of detail in explanations
  • Unnatural text flow
  • Duplicate information

Solution link

Step 1: Gather Information link

Copy and paste the necessary information from multiple sources. At this stage, it doesn’t need to be organized.

item.title: Integration between AI Answer Assist and AI Email Response Composer
item.description:
Integration of Two AI Features link

AI Answer Assist (AI Answer Improver) seamlessly integrates with AI Email Response Composer (AI Answer Composer) to achieve more efficient response creation.

Integration Flow link

Step 1: Automatic Response Draft Generation link

AI Email Response Composer (AI Answer Composer) automatically generates response drafts from ticket conversation history and knowledge base.

Step 2: Transfer to Editing Screen link

The generated response draft is directly transferred to the AI Answer Assist (AI Answer Improver) editing screen.

item.title: Security and OpenAI Integration for AI Answer Assist
item.description:
Security and Integration Methods link

AI Answer Assist (AI Answer Improver) is designed with security as a priority and can be operated safely.

Integration Methods link

AI Answer Assist operates in conjunction with one of the following:

FlowHunt Integration link

This is SmartWeb’s standard integration method. AI functionality is utilized through the FlowHunt platform.

Features:

  • Included in the SmartWeb contract
  • Can integrate with FlowHunt’s knowledge base
  • No additional API contract required

OpenAI Integration link

This is a method where customers contract directly with OpenAI and use their own API key.

item.title: What are the 4 text adjustment options in AI Answer Assist?
item.description:
4 Text Adjustment Options link

AI Answer Assist (AI Answer Improver) provides four powerful options for optimizing existing text.

1. Improve link

Refines text to make it clearer and more professional.

Polishes expressions in text created by staff and converts it into a well-organized, readable format. Creates high-quality text suitable for business communication.

2. Extend link

Enriches text with detailed explanations and additional information.

Adds necessary supplementary explanations and background information to responses that are too brief. Creates more complete answers that are easier for customers to understand.

item.title: What Can You Do with Custom Instructions?
item.description:
Custom Instructions Feature link

Using the custom instructions feature of AI Answer Assist (AI Answer Improver), you can request detailed text adjustments from AI using your own specific instructions.

Examples of Custom Instructions link

Instructions Related to Technical Terms link

  • “Add explanations for technical terms”
  • “Replace technical terms with common expressions”
  • “Write out abbreviations in full”
  • “Change to beginner-friendly expressions”

Instructions Related to Writing Style and Tone link

  • “Make the expressions more polite”
  • “Increase the level of honorific language”
  • “Change to a friendlier tone”
  • “Make it sound like a business email”

Instructions Related to Format link

  • “Convert to bullet points”
  • “Turn key points into a numbered list”
  • “Add headings to structure the content”
  • “Organize into table format”

Instructions Related to Translation link

  • “Translate to English”
  • “Translate to Chinese”
  • “Translate to Spanish”
  • “After translation, also include the original Japanese”

Instructions Related to Length Adjustment link

  • “Summarize in 3 lines or less”
  • “Add detailed explanations”
  • “Keep only the important points”
  • “Put the conclusion at the beginning”

Instructions for Adding or Removing Specific Elements link

  • “Add greeting text”
  • “Add closing remarks”
  • “Add apologetic expressions”
  • “Remove unnecessary modifiers”

Combining Multiple Instructions link

With custom instructions, you can also combine multiple requests.

item.title: What is AI Answer Improver?
item.description:
Overview of AI Answer Improver link

AI Answer Improver is a feature built into LiveAgent that assists operators (agents) with AI-powered writing support. It integrates with FlowHunt or OpenAI to instantly improve and adjust customer response messages.

Key Features link

AI Polishes Your Writing link

AI instantly brushes up drafts created by agents. Complete professional responses in a short time. Accessible via the magic pen icon in the ticket reply editor.
